title: Science Career Exploration Program Using Podcasts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and general understanding of career exploration
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment aimed at fostering a realistic understanding of scientific career paths through interviews with STEAM field experts

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three misconceptions about science career paths by analyzing podcast interviews with STEM experts.
Learners can list five or more actual work environments and required competencies for science-related professions based on interview content.
Learners can create personalized career roadmaps after podcast learning and refine them by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
